column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Fast forward to NYE 2017. I decided to spend the entire day eating all my "last meals" before starting the Whole 30. We started off with the tempura Brussels sprouts
column2: then split the veggie soup with spicy broth (extra noodles & broth). After one bite
column3: I knew I had been wrong about ramen for all these years. In retrospect
column4: I realize I'm not fond of seaweed and bamboo...but I reeeeeally like gourmet ramen.
